Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentlemens, Wiarus Company has the honor to present a new "Light Munar Probe". It's small, light and functional.

![xzaouoC.png](http://i.imgur.com/xzaouoC.png)

On the launchpad:

![XI8i1tJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/XI8i1tJ.png)

And Engineer Raport:

![fAnDxBL.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fAnDxBL.jpg)

My mission to Mun:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/UNK5g)

And my first mission to Minmus [WARNING! First photo in the album should be last]:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/96lpU)

Cpt. Jebediah Kerman is coming!

I got another cheap probe design, with around 9500 per probe (launches 3 probes at the same time)

Each probe has 2100m/s dv

![33552003984c107c157612bfb2ffba2a.png](https://i.gyazo.com/33552003984c107c157612bfb2ffba2a.png)![894f4c9349db2a88c64a202a903a05bd.png](https://i.gyazo.com/894f4c9349db2a88c64a202a903a05bd.png)![37461b5350c12b41715b2f1f0fad8292.png](https://i.gyazo.com/37461b5350c12b41715b2f1f0fad8292.png)

But my probe was cheaper [only unnamed pod, antenna, main solar panel, reserve solar panel - smallest in the "Utility" and one battery]. Without engines [they are useless in communications satelites]. Otherwise it was challenge for lightest lander, probe-lander and orbital probe on [forum.kerbale.pl](http://forum.kerbale.pl)

EDIT: I said this about mission on Minmus.

> 
> But my probe was cheaper [only unnamed pod, antenna, main solar panel, reserve solar panel - smallest in the "Utility" and one battery]. Without engines [they are useless in communications satelites]. Otherwise it was challenge for lightest lander, probe-lander and orbital probe on [forum.kerbale.pl](http://forum.kerbale.pl)
> EDIT: I said this about mission on Minmus.

I mean, the whole launch costed around 27000 funds, and "launching" each probe costed 9500(I launch 3 probes at a time)

One of those probes cost only 2300, and will cost even less when I get lvl3 tracking station and get rid of the KER circuit.

Great Return:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/B6b2v)

Nice plane!

Wait, is that a gun in front of the seat? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Yes.

And, this is short-range, small fighter:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/fwUBJ)

- - - Updated - - -

My new aids:

[https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/PZL_P.7](https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/PZL_P.7)

[https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/PZL.23_Kara%C5%9B](https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/PZL.23_Kara%C5%9B)

[https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/PZL_P.24](https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/PZL_P.24)

Choose one and vote what I will do. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

My first replica. Guess what the aircraft was replicated. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/mMwaY)

Cheap Flight to the Mun

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/WFhhs/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>
